Each passing clown bestows his blessing,

line_2: AWAY; let nought to love displeasing,

line_1: SUE venal Belinda to grant you the blessing
line_2: As Jove courted Danae, or vain's your addressing;

For how precarious is the blessing!

line_1: When he wept, the Mother's Blessing
That he had lost but one day's blessing,
line_2: When we so many lose, by dressing.

line_1: Nor less that Day deserves a Blessing
line_2: She cramm'd his Sister to Excess in:

line_1: And now to the Fish he is giving his Blessing;
line_2: So frequently dines here without any pressing,
Till the Toilet calls to Dressing;

line_1: Not worth, though you hold life a blessing,

line_2: All which I see you, Sir, possessing.
